Coordinates: Cartesian to Cylindrical ~ Cartesian to Cylindrical
Cartesian to Spherical ~ Cartesian to Spherical
Cylindrical to Cartesian ~ Cylindrical to Cartesian
Spherical to Cartesian ~ Spherical to Cartesian
Curve: Align To Spline ~ Align Geometry to Spline with position offsets
Lathe Curve ~ Mesh from Curve by rotating points around a fixed circular axis
Smooth Curve ~ Curve to Bezier with smoothing
Sweep Curve ~ Mesh from Profile Curve along with input Curve with parameters
Curve Primitives: Curve Ellipse ~ Curve Primitive with Curve parameters
Logarithmic Spiral ~ Curve Primitive with Curve parameters
Spirograph ~ Curve Primitive with Curve parameters
Spiroshell ~ Curve Primitive with Curve parameters
Deformers: Bend ~ Deform along an arbitrary axis
Displacer ~ Displace Geometry based on Texture
Shear ~ Slide Geometry along an arbitrary axis
Twist ~ Rotation along an arbitrary axis
UV To Mesh ~ Deform Mesh to specified UV
Fields: Modify Field ~ Field Modifier with direct controls of the input Field
Geometry: Center Elements ~ Reset Location to Worldspace Coordinates
Geometry To Spline ~ Convert any input Geometry to Spline
Parent To Object ~ Parent Location, Rotation, Scale to Object
Set Geometry Size ~ Reset Bound Geometry
Set Geometry Visibility ~ Set Visibility in the viewport or Render
Input: Boundary Edge Selection ~ Selection of all edges with one neighbouring face
Edge Angle Selection ~ Selection of particular edge with specified edge angle
Face Sides Selection ~ Selection of all faces that have a specified number of edges.
Loose Edge Selection ~ Selection of all faces that do not share edges with other faces
Non-Manifold Edge Selection ~ Selection of any edge shared by more than two faces
Is Empty Geometry ~ Is Geometry Empty or with No Points? Used with a switch to avoid computations
Is Inside Volume ~ Is Geometry have Volume inside it
Instancers: Grid Instancer ~ Instance along X,Y,Z Axis
Linear Instancer ~ Instance along Straight Linear
Spherical Instancer ~ Instance on Spherical Spiral
Mesh: Inset Faces ~ Inner Extrusion of faces
Poke Faces ~ Poke faces at face center with access to depth
Rotate Elements ~ Rotate at Individual Origin
Segmental Extrude ~ Repeated Extrusion of segments
Shade Auto Smooth ~ Edge Split over unsigned angles of degree
Mesh To SDF ~ Mesh to Signed Distance Function
Mesh To Field ~ Mesh to proximate Field
Point Primitives: Point Grid ~ Point Primitive with Points over XYZ Directions with spacing
Point Honeycomb ~ Point Primitive with Points offset over X & Y to form Honeycomb-like structure
Phyllotaxis ~ Point Primitive with Point over the arrangement of leaves on a plant stem
SDF: SDF Boolean ~ Combine two SDF to output Union/ Difference/ Intersection
Utilities: Empty Group ~ Group with input and output
Transforms To Position ~ Location, Rotation, Scale to Position
Vector: Replace Vector ~ Replace specific Values in X,Y,Z
Vector Clamp ~ Clamp Vector Minimum and Maximum
Vector Mapping ~ Control Location, Rotation, Scale of a Vector
